title: Breaking News: Doom Metal Scientists Discover Slowest Riff Possible [News]
text:
UG editor. Music lover. Constant searcher of something interesting and unique. Posted 14 hours ago 6 
Today is a great day for all doom metal and drone metal enthusiasts!.. The Onion are reporting that doom metal scientists have "discovered the slowest riff possible." 
Watch their video report on this exciting discovery below:
